data.why:
I have writen a "taglib", its something like a
    html/xml-template-tool. Very usefull for cgi-scripts I think its
    small but very powerfull and worthy to be contributed vie cpan. *g*

    For Example it allows recusive and multi-nested Tags in a template.
    So a variable table can easily generated.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (LORTAS; Holger von Rhein)
